text: Sunshine Cleaning is a 2008 comedy-drama film directed by Christine Jeffs and starring Amy Adams and Emily Blunt. Written by Megan Holley, the film premiered at the 2008 Sundance Film Festival on January 18, 2008. It was purchased by Overture Films for distribution and opened in limited release in the United States on March 13, 2009. The film was released on DVD and Blu-ray on August 25, 2009.
